Octofeed

This is ios app for reading Github Feed.

View on Github

What’s Octofeed

feature

  • index Github feed.

    • Github feed is very useful.
    • if you know more, watch What’s Github feed page

  • make easy to add/remove star, watch/unwatch repository and follow/unfollow person

  • readable readme file and owner’s profile page

Download

  • Now waiting review in App Store.

for Developer

  • Octofeed is Written by RubyMotion.
  • You can run Octofeed in your iPhone after download source code and build.

Back to top

motion-octofeed is maintained by amazedkoumei
